courses.name: General English (Beginner to Upper Intermediat)
courses.durationDetail: Minimum 12 weeks (10 wks Tuition + 2 wks Break)
courses.tuitionDetail: 1 BLOCK OF ELICOS GENERAL ENGLISH FREE when packaged with any VET course; 1 ELICOS Block = 12 weeks (10 wks Tuition + 2 wks Break) ($200 per week if enrolled for less than 12 weeks)
